name: Farm To Feast
description:
A short game made for the kids in the Salvation Army Boys and Girls Club of High Point, NC. The purpose of the game is to show kids where their food comes from. It is meant to be a short interactive story and not necessarily a full game.

Template provided by Stencyl, the rest of the game done by Fernando Barroso, Christian Jones, Trey Kivett, Scott O'Neil, and Josh Shogren.
